self_predictions.prediction_summary: John believes he needs to be more aggressive and control Sasho's hand and wrist to win. He acknowledges Sasho's strength and endurance but thinks he can outmaneuver him with proper strategy.
self_predictions.style_conflict: John plans to avoid a long match and be aggressive off the start.

Sasho Andreev.strength: Very strong, especially in side pressure.
Sasho Andreev.previous_match_summary: Sasho has losses to Spartak Zolev and others but is considered one of the best pound-for-pound arm wrestlers.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: John thinks Todd's aggressive style and side pressure will be too much for Kydyrgali, especially if Todd gets him off center.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Todd's side pressure vs Kydyrgali's endurance.

Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Todd manhandled John in their previous match.

Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.previous_match_summary: Kydyrgali has shown great endurance but may struggle against Todd's aggression.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: John believes Devon's leverage, endurance, and ability to control the hand and wrist will be too much for Denis, who lacks the cup to turn Devon's wrist.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Denis's sloppy style vs Devon's controlled leverage.

Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon has shown consistent dominance in recent matches.

Denis Cyplenkov.previous_match_summary: Denis has been training hard but lacks the cup to control top-tier opponents.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: John thinks Rustam's ability to use his back and tricep to stay high and come down with force will be key. He believes Irakli will struggle if Rustam gets wrist control.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Rustam's inside hook vs Irakli's outside style.

Rustam Babaiev.previous_match_summary: Rustam has been effective against top pullers but had a recent loss to Paul Linn.

Irakli Zirakashvili.strength: Good against hook pullers but loses wrist control.
Irakli Zirakashvili.previous_match_summary: Irakli has struggled with hand control against top opponents.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: John thinks Zaur's power and recent recovery from injury will give him the edge over Georgi, despite Georgi's size advantage.

Zaur Paizulaev.previous_match_summary: Zaur has shown ability to control top opponents like Denis.

Georgi Tsvetkov.strength: Huge arm size makes him difficult to handle.
Georgi Tsvetkov.previous_match_summary: Georgi's size has been a challenge for opponents.
